title: Nokia 139 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Sound by Onkyo  (55TAUHDN)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Mini AV Cable, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 TV Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, Wallmount Stand, 4 Wallmount Stand Screws, User Manual
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, AVI, TS, MOV, MKV, DAT, MP4, VOB, RM, RMVB
product_specification.Other Video Features: Micro Dimming, Max Brite, Pronto Focal AI Engine, AI Sound, Picture, Interaction, Advanced Contrast Ratio, HDR 10
product_specification.Sound Technology: Sound by Onkyo, Onkyo sound bar, Certified by Onkyo Home Theater System, 6D Sound, Dolby Audio
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, WMA, M4A, AAC, MP2, PCM, MPEG
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Auto Volume Function, Volume Offset, 150% More Clarity, Dynamic Amplification Technology, 30 W Speaker, 18 W Tweeters
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Google Assistant, Chromecast Built-in, Google Home, Compatible with Gamepad
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: To Register Warranty Support, Please Call on 080-46331010 or Email to nokiatv@flipkart.com
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Sound by Onkyo: Experience sounds come to life – all thanks to the renowned Japanese brand Onkyo. You enjoy 6D sound with low distortion (< 3%) as well as balanced bass and vocals so that you can immerse yourself in each and every scene you watch.
product_description.48 W Sound Power: It boasts 30 W QuatroX speakers, along with 18 W tweeters, to deliver a 360-degree audio projection to ensure that your room is filled with rich and dynamic sound. In addition, its powerful left-right stereo output makes for high-quality sound reproduction for an immersive audio experience.

review:
its a good tv in the price range. far ahead of existing MI,TCL and all other tvs of this price range. color is awesome, contrast level is also very good. it offers extra picture enhancements like live color, black correction etc. picture wise no complains. many ppl wrote its a VA panel has viewing issues but trust me its awesome to watch this tv.
Sound is awesome, my hall is 22*18ft and sound is nowhere less in any corner, dont expect it to be like hometheatre. i did not face any connectivity issue yet but yes, it takes almost 1 min to get all the connection ready which means if you just start and open youtube it will not connect after 30-40 sec it starts all connection.
some thing Nokia may improve :
1. I personally dont like the surround sound feature as as soon you make it On the bass vanishes.
2. frame rates could be better like if it gets an update like MEMC or motionflow technology of Sony it would be an awesome deal. currntly it is also good
3. 5G wifi is not supported only 2.4G is supported

Go for it if you dont want to spend 1.25 lakh for Sony
Cheers!

During 2020 big billion days i bought it.After so many research ....( I was planning to buy a Sony TV... but we can blindly save a lot of money if you go for Nokia with same config.)

Guys...I’m sharing my feedback after 30 days of usage.
TV clarity , design & sound everything is good ( you don’t even need external speaker). Delivery was super fast .

My installation agent was very hurry & rushing.. which makes me uncomfortable. Except everything is good at this moment. Thank you Flipkart ❤️

The TV is just awesome, don't believe in any roumors it works like a charm. Picture quality and sound are unmatched in this price range.
The issues which this TV had earlier
1- Wifi issue : This is fixed via an update (though it was possible to do manually )
2- Tv reboot : This only happens when u play Dolby vision HDR videos and that is due to slow internet speed, I have 20 mbps wifi plan and it only buffers in Dolby Vision HDR 4k videos but when i pause the stream for 15-20 seconds it works like a charm so a solution to this is to have good internet speed 40mbps recommended.
I didn't find any issues with wall mount as well, the sound is simply breath taking i never increased the volume to more than 25% its that loud and crisp. Considering playing 4k videos it works beautifully on all ott platforms like Netflix, not having Dolby vison and dual band wifi doesn't make any difference as the picture quality is excellent even without Dolby Vision for a normal user you simply cannot find any difference in Dolby vision 4k HDR video and a normal 4k HDR video and single band wifi works like a champ no issues faced as of now (except Dolby Vison enabled 4k HDR videos on youtube), rest all 4k HDR videos stream without any issue even with 20mbps speed (on youtube and all ott platforms).
Coming to setup box i have Tata sky setup box and believe me even sd channels look brilliant (recommend viewing distance more than 5 feet), Haven't tried hd channels on tata sky yet.

My conclusion is just go for it without any second thought, 50" variant is much better than 43" in both picture and sound.

After Lot of Search i Choose this Tv and it's Very Good Decision for me and My Family.
Every one is Happy with Tv.
Sound is very Good
Picture quality is awesome
Connectivity is superb over mobile Data and WiFi also

But Only one things is not good it's Installation the person is came and he was in hurry so he didn't give proper time for demo.
Even i feel tv is not Proper install on wall mount.

Other wise almost 5 out of 5

I start with cons as pros are everywhere.
Cons:
1. Panel don't have good viewing angles especially in bright daylight conditions, u can see lots of reflection if you are sitting slightly on left or right.
2. Don't support 5Ghz wifi, so my wifi do have 5GHz with 100 Mbs but this TV connects to 2.4GHz having 40Mbs speed, you can still watch 4K content, but I noticed it's not super smooth, also live HD channels viewing experience is not that great.
3. Sound quality no doubt is good, but sometimes you feel there's a need for external sound bar n sub woofer.

That's all, I have given it 4 star just because of its value for money, I can't find a TV under 40K giving this much features.
If nokia can improve on first 2 points, there's nothing much left to argue to be honest.

So whom I should recommend:
If you have a closed room, with minimum sunlight, this panel display works for you. I have added pictures, refer them.
Also if you have wifi speed of > 40 mbs at 2.4GHz, this TV displays smoothly.

Hope this helps, I have added pics with 4K video running at 90 degree n around 140 degree, check them out.

For price...this is a great TV. Good picture quality..bright screen..sound is great for a TV..although i noticed some audio sync problem in netflix. For the asking price..it is a good deal. I hope it works the way it is working for at least 5-6 years
Review after using it for couple of months
Picture quality is good...but speakers are gone now....dont know what happened...audio quality and volume is like 50% less now. I never had to used it above 30% vol..but now..even at 70% vol is very low. Even my phone sounds louder than this now
Pathetic purchase

Reviewing after one month of daily use I can tell that it is a value for money product. Good sound, good picture and plays very well all the apps and 4k videos is also amazing if you have a good internet connection

Good tv and video clarity is sooo good and bright nokia is one of the best brand in india and sound is super.
Connectivity also good.
Must buy this TV.

Outstanding Picture quality and fabulous sound.
I recommend everyone to buy this TV.
I am already using a MI TV but this 100 times more better than that.

Update : Got the Dth sound working. Go to settings then external HDMI inputs and change to 2.0 from the selected 1.4. This will make the sound work and improve the HD picture quality.

For my experience this tv will satisfy all your needs.. picture quality and sound is excellent in LED segment.. Don't compare with samsung/LG since it's far beyond its reach. Money I paid for tv is valuable.. if you are having good budget then go for qled tv.

I got at 38,999. I guess it was a good deal.

(Reset to factory default and update all apps in play store and then login). Also there is an online update which some users have reported that the problem got resolved after the update.

Build is also good with solid stand.
Connectivity is good (Keep Ethernet toggle on although you will not connect internet through Ethernet).
Picture quality although a VA Panel has very good viewing angles. Deep black and colour reproduction is excellent.
You will not go wrong for the price.

The point is that we are not Guinea pigs where a companies does the product testing after selling it to customers. Bare minimum expectations is that every piece goes through a thorough QC before being sold. (We all are aware of prime video issue).

Atleast this was not expected from NOKIA.

My Advice: Purchase this TV only if you are willing to be a Guinea pigs to NOKIA by paying 40,000 from your pocket.

After a month long research of 55 inch TVs where I evaluated the Motorola ZX pro, Hi sense, Toshiba, Blaupunkt etc I bought this during the July 21 sale. So it's been about two weeks of using the TV. Delivery was next day and install the day after. Having used an LEtv 55 and a Samsung FHD 55 before, I had some reference points to check this against in addition to my research. While it's a bit too early to comment, TV checks out fine as of now. WiFi connection is flawless. Not sure why people want 5Ghz when 2.4Ghz does the job perfectly. 4K video streams instantly and I have not noticed any buffering whatsoever. Android TV works flawlessly too and I have noticed no lag at all. As for the sound, the Onkyo speakers are superb.None of my other more established brand TVs have a sound this good. Colour reproduction is excellent and pictures pop out. There is a sheen/ sharpness in the pictures. I tried all HDMI ports and the USB ports and all works fine so far. I was able to connect a camera to the USB port and the downloaded Google Duo detected it perfectly. As for issues, there was a problem of the TV restarting by itself ( on rare occasions) which resolved upon resetting the TV. I would say for around 37K, it seems a good deal. I have taken extended warranty from Flipkart not knowing long term reliability. While the picture and sound are great, what I like more about the TV is the look of it when switched off. It is aesthetically pleasing with the fabric covered Onkyo sound bar at the bottom and almost bezel less screen it enhances the decor..It is quite thin too. Also, the viewing angles are great and the screen doesn't reflect light abnormally. Need to now see long term reliability. I would strongly recommend this TV..

To anybody who is reading this, please don't be lured by the competitive pricing of this TV as you will surely regret your purchase after the initial couple of months.

This TV suffers from really bad software, and even worse service.

1) The UI lags while doing basic things such as scrolling apps on the home screen even out of the box.

2) The customer service is the worst you will ever experience. The TV is branded by Nokia, the support is provided by Flipkart and the Service is done by this delivery partner Jeeves. So don't be fooled by Nokia's brand value. My product in particular started having wifi connectivity issues within the first 6 months of my purchase. My TV would randomly disconnect from the internet and just not connect back. I tried factory reset, multiple routers and every other possible solution provided to me over phone but to no effect. It was even accepted by the company that the product provided to me has a faulty motherboard. It has been 4 months since I have been facing this issue at the day of writing this review but the defect on my TV has still not been rectified. I write mails and call the customer support and all they say is "we will get back to you within 10 days" which has taken 4 months.

3) Not even a year, receiving a product with a faulty motherboard and no resolution from the company for 4 months. In fact, this product is not even made by Nokia. The product is manufactured by Flipkart itself and is merely marketed by Nokia. Further, they have an external service team Jeeves that is just not good enough and fail to do their job.

I am stuck with this product, having already wasted my money on this. I hope this review is read by prospective buyers and even save one person from wasting their money on a sub-standard product.

This is not a Nokia product. It's flipkart product with Nokia badge.
Video - 4/5
Audio - 5/5
Software - 1/5
* TV launches always with live tv input and not the Android Hub screen. User needs to exit everytime to go to Home screen
* TV crashes and reboot quite often
* Doesn't have low power standby support
* Video & Audio codec error frequently seen in Android
* After app upgrade, Google Voice search stopped working. Factory reset resolved it
* HDMI ARC not supported.
* WiFi supports only 2.4 GHz (Motorola TV supports both band)
* WiFi is very sensitive.
* If Ethernet option is disabled in settings, Wifi will get disconnected.
* Picture quality not suitable for brightly lit room
* Remote: Ease of Use 5/5 Durability : 2/5

PROS:
Speaker well calibrated for Voice/Speech/Vocal (5 stars)
Picture Quality in Android - 4 stars
Sufficient space between TV & Wall after wall mount, easier access to connect HDMI, USB.
Play mobile audio in TV Speaker through bluetooth.
Supports NTFS HDD

CONS:
Service is handled by 3rd party contractors
No Guarantee of Android upgrade.
USB drives get heated up quickly
If you run into technical issue in the first 10 days of purchase, only option is to get replacement. Service support will start after 10 days of installation.

This tv is a perfect product for those who wants a good 4k tv in budget. I researched a lot both in online and offline store for all the brands and finally bought this one and this item did justice to my decision.

Pros:
1. Picture quality is best at this price.
2. Sound is crisp.
3. Connectivity is good.
4. Android tv experience is best felt without any problem.

Cons:
1. After the update, everyone commented about sound to be reduced. I felt the same. Hope it will be rectified with another update.
2. If you compare QLED/OLED/ Sony high end tvs with this, you won't find the darkest color what they produce. Of course the technology is different and price wise they are providing much better tv panel. So you can ignore this con.
3. I faced google assistant to be not working for once. Which got handled by resetting the tv.

Final verdict:

This is the best budget 4k tv for those who like to binge watch a lot. Price wise this is a good tv which comes with onkyo soundbar fitted. One small suggestion to take 3 years warranty from Flipkart which can be handy in future.

Purchased this 55 inch Nokia TV and was installation on 01.11.2020. After viewing the programs on TV, I found following pros & cons
PROS:
1) Sound by Onkyo is excellent.
2) Installation was done properly and features explained properly. The person who installed the TV was very courtesies and soft spoken.
3) Features given are very good.
4) Very easy to operate.

CONS:
1) The viewing angle is not 178 degree as claimed. The picture is not clear and starts getting blurred on viewing from about 60 degree.
2) Viewing on HD channels is excellent but viewing of Non HD does not give you pleasure. On minute observation, the pictures are a little blur.
3) The Wi-fi connection is of only single band 2.4. Should have been provided with dual band (2.4/5G) within same cost.

Sound = Excellent quality, good bass, nice vocal and treble.

Value for money.

Connectivity: wifi Nice, but I am using lan wire to experience 4K buffering.

Remote: 3/5 bcz of little bit lag and design of volume button in middle.

Options on remote are limited but good enough to work upon.

Bluetooth connectivity to headphone is nice after pairing but everytime you need to open an app to connect, which is frustrating.

Booting of Android tv is slow and taking around 20 to 30 sec to load.

If you are using any cable or dth network then you need 2 remotes as we hv for old tvs. Even now a days most of the companies configure set top box remote in one.

Overall my ratings is 8/10 in this price segment.
